Module com.cyslide
Package com.cyslide.Model

Class IndestructibleTile

java.lang.Object
com.cyslide.Model.Tile
com.cyslide.Model.IndestructibleTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class IndestructibleTile extends Tile
The IndestructibleTile class represents an indestructible tile in the game. It extends the Tile class and inherits its properties and methods.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new IndestructibleTile object with the specified position.

      public boolean mouvementAvailable(int x, int y, String direction, RectangleWithLabel[][] table)
      This method is overridden to always return true for this type of tile.
      Specified by:
      mouvementAvailable in class Tile
      Parameters:
